title: Jerk pork chops with rice and peas
description: Add more or less scotch bonnet chillies to this recipe, depending how hot you like it. You can get gungo peas (pigeon peas) in the freezer cabinet of many supermarkets these days.
ingredients: 1–2 scotch bonnet chillies, depending on how hot you want it, seeds removed
4 large pork chops (preferably a fatty, on-the-bone cut)
